attributes.action: Create a National Rescue Bank to help the UK survive the financial meltdown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create a National Rescue Bank to receive deposits offering attractive interest rates (withdrawal subject to suitable notice). The bank will use the deposits to provide last resort short term secured loans to strategic UK industries (at high interest rates) to avoid massive job losses, food/fuel/energy shortages and the breakdown of law and order. It must not lend more than 100% of the deposits.
